short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video to Article is a browser extension that uses AI to convert YouTube Videos into Articles.
short.ja: Video to Articleは、AI を使用してYouTubeの動画を記事に変換するブラウザ拡張機能です。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time by converting YouTube videos into articles.

Advantages of writing articles from YouTube videos:
 - Saves time compared to watching entire YouTube videos.
 - By turning videos into articles, you can read them at your own pace.
